<title level="1" pfs="">["Lucky" Lanks](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1966)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">["Lucky" Lanks](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1966)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 24</row>

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +13, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[_chest feather token_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=244), [Coat Pistol](/Weapons.aspx?ID=189) (20 rounds), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (4), [Hunting Spider Venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=118) (3), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_, [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 70

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_shortsword_ +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d6+4 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
coat pistol +15 ([Concealable](/Traits.aspx?ID=327), [Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+4 piercing

**Scoundrel's Feint**   When Lanks successfully [Feints](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), his target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against his attacks until the end of his next turn. On a critical success, the target is flat-footed against all attacks until the end of Lanks's next turn.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   Lanks deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: "Lucky" Lanks

text: "Lucky" Lanks Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 30 Unspecific Lore : DC 28 Specific Lore : DC 25 "Lucky" Lanks Source Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz pg. 24 Perception +11 Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +13, Deception +13, Diplomacy +13, Intimidation +13, Stealth +13, Thievery +13 Str +2 Dex +4 Con +0 Int +2 Wis +0 Cha +4 Items chest feather token , Coat Pistol (20 rounds), Dagger (4), Hunting Spider Venom (3), +1 striking shortsword , Thieves' Tools --- AC 20 Fort +9 Ref +15 Will +12 HP 70 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action shortsword +16 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, versatile S), Damage 2d6+4 piercing Melee Single Action dagger +15 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 1d4+4 piercing Ranged Single Action coat pistol +15 (Concealable, Concussive, fatal d8, range increment 30 feet, reload 1), Damage 1d4+4 piercing Ranged Single Action dagger +15 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+4 piercing Scoundrel's Feint When Lanks successfully Feints, his target is flat-footed against his attacks until the end of his next turn. On a critical success, the target is flat-footed against all attacks until the end of Lanks's next turn. Sneak Attack Lanks deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
